title: Why nothing that can be bought with blue essence except champs
body: Ok, so my main account is sitting on 151,000 waste of blue essence.  There is absolutely nothing I need, from day one when they changed the runes, to which I owned almost all I received useless blue essence.  I already owned all of the champs, and now its just a ridiculous insult that there is no actual content that makes having any essence worthwhile.
